vote.title: Authorize a three-year Interlocal Agreement with the University of Texas at San Antonio to provide consulting services and technical assistance for the Dallas Police Department violent crime reduction effort for the period March 15, 2025 through March 31, 2028 - Not to exceed $337,305.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
